segments.text: I'm watching this kitchen unfold, and something catches my eye.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying a plate, but the sink behind her is full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the water's cascading over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got no idea, foot right in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the boy's on the stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whoa, that stool's about to tip backward!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's all expectant, arm up for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the kids to be so bold while she's distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a serene garden, totally contrasting this surprise inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how much is happening without anyone noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing water is the real shocker here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those open cabinets frame the boy's risky climb perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR
